title: BRIEF-Energy Fuels Receives Federal Government Approvals For Expansion Of La Sal Complex Of Uranium, Vanadium Mines

organizations.name: federal government approvals for expansion of la sal complex of uranium
expansion of la sal complex of uranium

text: February 26, 2018 / 11:52 AM / in 3 minutes BRIEF-Energy Fuels Receives Federal Government Approvals For Expansion Of La Sal Complex Of Uranium, Vanadium Mines Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - Energy Fuels Inc: * ENERGY FUELS RECEIVES FEDERAL GOVERNMENT APPROVALS FOR EXPANSION OF ITS LA SAL COMPLEX OF URANIUM AND VANADIUM MINES * ENERGY FUELS - ‍GOT APPROVAL FROM U.S. BLM, U.S. FOREST SERVICE FOR EXPANSION OF LA SAL COMPLEX OF URANIUM/VANADIUM MINES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
